Text: Each Palantír Pack includes 3 Palantír Views and 1 random new Valor Card

Text_FR: Each Palantír Pack includes 3 Palantír Views and 1 random new Valor Card

Text: Though he comes from humble beginnings, Samwise Gamgee rises to any challenge with unmatched bravery and determination. This pack is tailor-made for cleverness, helping you sneak past the watchful Eye of Sauron to claim victory through daring and stealth.
Text_CN: 虽然他出身低微，Samwise Gamgee 面对任何挑战都有无以伦比的勇气和决心 这个卡包专为机智的你定制，帮助你通过大胆和潜行逃过索伦之眼并获得胜利。
Text_FR: Though he comes from humble beginnings, Samwise Gamgee rises to any challenge with unmatched bravery and determination. This pack is tailor-made for cleverness, helping you sneak past the watchful Eye of Sauron to claim victory through daring and stealth.

Text: Faramir does not seek glory in danger without purpose. Touched by the wisdom and sadness of the Elder Race, he is shrewd in battle. This pack gives you the abilities needed to outlast Sauron’s forces and stand victorious at the battle’s end.
Text_CN: Faramir 不贪求没有目的的荣耀。受到长老一族智慧和悲伤的影响，他在战斗中聪明异常 这个卡包让你有能力和索伦比拼耐力并在最后获得战斗的胜利。
Text_FR: Faramir does not seek glory in danger without purpose. Touched by the wisdom and sadness of the Elder Race, he is shrewd in battle. This pack gives you the abilities needed to outlast Sauron’s forces and stand victorious at the battle’s end.

Text: Éowyn is renowned for her courage and compassion. With inner strength strong as tempered steel, she stands unflinching before even the greatest threats. This pack emphasizes cards that help your party defend against any threat no matter how numerous or mighty.
Text_CN: Éowyn 以勇气和同情心著称。内心无比强大如同钢铁，她在最大的威胁面前也不为动容 本卡包侧重让你能抵御强敌的卡牌。
Text_FR: Éowyn is renowned for her courage and compassion. With inner strength strong as tempered steel, she stands unflinching before even the greatest threats. This pack emphasizes cards that help your party defend against any threat no matter how numerous or mighty.

Text: Legolas has unmatched prowess as an archer. Employing acute senses and breathtaking agility, he outmaneuvers foes to defeat them before they even see him coming. This pack taps into Elvish tactics, using wits and swiftness to strike down enemies with deadly accuracy.
Text_CN: Legolas 作为射手有着无可比拟的威力。他感知敏锐，动如脱兔，在敌人看到他之前就能将敌人打败 本卡包侧着Elvish类的技巧，用你的智慧和决断去给与敌人致命一击吧。
Text_FR: Legolas has unmatched prowess as an archer. Employing acute senses and breathtaking agility, he outmaneuvers foes to defeat them before they even see him coming. This pack taps into Elvish tactics, using wits and swiftness to strike down enemies with deadly accuracy.

Text: The Lord of the Rings™: Living Card Game™ is still in active development. Features, cards, effects, and mechanics are subject to change for any number of reasons based on game play data and user feedback. If you run into any game play issues or bugs, or have any feedback, please let us know at our Steam Discussions. We appreciate your taking part in our early access development so that we can refine, balance, and improve the game. Now… on to Middle-earth and the adventures that await you there!

Text: The King of Dale seeks an alliance with the Beornings and you have agreed to act as his envoy. To reach their lands, you must brave the dangers of Mirkwood Forest.
Your party camps for the night deep within Mirkwood. You awaken hours later from a troubled sleep to discover that giant spiders have captured your friends!
Though free of the giant spiders' lair, your party is lost in the dark forest. You must get your bearings if you hope to escape the vastness of Mirkwood.
Even as you leave the dangers of Mirkwood Forest behind, new threats arise as you make your way down the mighty Anduin River.
You have reached the land of the Beornings at last. But a new complication arises: Their leader, Grimbeorn the Old, is missing!

A shadow looms over the forest of Mirkwood, threatening all the lands east of the Misty Mountains. Hearing of this threat, the King of Dale decides to unite the peoples who live along the dark forest's borders. You agree to act as his envoy to the Beornings. These reclusive skin changers dwell under the protection of Grimbeorn the Old in the Anduin Vale to the west. It is not a journey to be undertaken lightly—for, to reach Grimbeorn, you must journey through Mirkwood itself. Indeed, not long after entering the forest, you find yourself surrounded by servants of the growing darkness…

Orcs encroaching so far into Mirkwood? The King of Dale's concern was clearly justified, and your mission has taken on new urgency. You head down an overgrown trail to escape any Orcs who might pursue. Senses alert to danger, you react swiftly when a new threat appears! Giant spiders drop from the trees to attack your party. You drive back the creatures, only to discover that this was only a diversion—more spiders lunge from the snarled underbrush behind you! With horrifying speed, they wrap one of your friends in a silken cocoon and drag the captive off to be devoured. You cannot abandon your companion to such a fate.
Seeing the chitnious horde approach, you decide that the only chance of escape is to fight your way through them. You face the mass of spiders and begin your assault!
The number of spiders around you increases with every moment. Realizing that you are in danger of being overwhelmed, you decide to make a run for it!

Though you have escaped the spiders—at least for now—you find yourself far from the old Forest Road. Searching tirelessly, you at last spy a path on the far side of a dark, unnatural-looking stream. As you look for a place to ford, an enormous creature emerges from the water to attack!

Your mission for the King of Dale has uncovered the presence of Orcs in Mirkwood Forest. Troubling news indeed. You make camp after a long day traveling ever further in this foul place. Sleep comes quickly to your tired eyes, but unsettling dreams disturb your rest—nightmares filled with bulbous eyes gleaming from the shadows and skittering legs echoing in the dark. Awakening in the wan pre-dawn light, you find it wasn't a dream at all. While you slept, the giant spiders of Mirkwood carried off your friends—and have returned to claim you as well! You must escape these vile creatures and seek out your companions at once!

Searching through the night, you find your friends at last. They are held within a dark glade, bound in cocoons made of strong webbed cords. You slip through the shadows, seemingly unnoticed by the spiders in their webs high above. However, as you raise your blade to cut your companions free, the creatures drop to the forest floor and attack!

You've managed to cut your companions loose, but the spiders are determined to recapture you. They spin giant webs from tree to tree, trapping you in their lair. You will have to sunder the thick strands in order to escape.

You hack through the spiders’ webs but advance only a short distance when a massive form emerges from the gloom. The largest spider you have ever seen blocks your way forward, while her many offspring gather behind you to cut off any retreat. There is no turning back. You must defeat Ungoliant's Spawn.

You have rescued your friends and escaped the spiders' lair, only to find yourself lost in the vastness of Mirkwood. Far from the relative safety of the Forest Road, the woods are a dark tangle of twisted trees. It is impossible to know the correct direction to travel within this wooded maze. If you are to find your way out and continue your mission for the King of Dale, you must first find some landmarks to get your bearings…

A stream winds its way through the twisted roots of ancient trees that crowd the riverbank. You follow the water's course as best you can, battling uneven terrain each step of the way. Though the stream should lead you from Mirkwood eventually, you wonder if a less arduous option can be found.

You stand atop a low hill, a sea of green spreading for miles in all directions. Scanning the horizon, you spy a faint trail of grey smoke rising in the distance. Smoke suggests civilization, though in Mirkwood there's no telling whether this means friend or foe. Alternately, you could keep searching for the Forest Road or some other path through these corrupted woods

At long last, the stream you have been following empties into a wide bog. The Anduin River vale must lie beyond this morass. Though the moist ground sucks greedily at your feet with each step, you make your way across the swamp doggedly and with no small amount of relief at leaving the accursed wood behind. Just then, the bog ahead erupts in a shower of brackish water! A Giant Marsh Worm lunges for you with a ravenous speed that belies its size…

After a long, desperate search you find the trail at last. Overgrown and covered in animal tracks, this nonetheless promises to be your best means of reaching the Anduin Vale. You make good time at first, but soon realize that your presence has not gone unnoticed. While the path may ease travel, the roused denizens of Mirkwood shall make you fight for every step…

Navigating through the dense forest toward the smoke is no easy task, but at last you find the remains of an old Woodsmen village. Even more welcome to your eyes is the clear blue sky in the distance: you stand near the eaves of Mirkwood! Your relief is short-lived, however, as the village is overrun with Orcs! They spot your weary group, making it clear that you must fight to reach the Anduin Vale.

You stand at the shore of the Great River. The trials of Mirkwood Forest lay behind you at last, but you are still some distance from your destination: the land of the Beornings. Making your way south along the riverbank, you spy a raft which might speed your journey. As you approach the craft, a shadow falls before you: a fearsome Hill Troll looms up from behind a cluster of rocks! He lunges toward you, his eyes gleaming with murderous intent…

Having defeated the Troll, you scramble aboard the raft. Alas, while you may have left the Orcs on the shore, you face fresh danger as the Anduin carries you through a series of rapids! It will take all your skill to choose a safe course through the raging waters.

You steer the raft back to shore for a much-needed respite. Barely have you voiced your thanks at having firm ground beneath your feet when yet more Orcs come crashing through the underbrush! You decide that you have had enough of being hounded by these minions of the growing shadow. Weapons at the ready, you confront the ambush head on…

Traversing the Anduin River has brought you from the Forest Gate south to the Beornings. You explain that yours is a mission of great urgency: you must speak with Grimbeorn the Old about what you have uncovered in Mirkwood, and share the offer of alliance from the King of Dale. The tribe of Skin-changers regrets that their chieftain is not present. He was last seen as a great bear, roaming south toward his stony outlook at the Carrock. You cannot afford to wait for his return. In order to find Grimbeorn, you will have to go after him at once…

You track Grimbeorn throughout the day, and shortly after sunset, you find evidence of a violent struggle. It is clear that the mighty Skin-changer faced a powerful foe… or foes. You see no further sign of Grimbeorn's tracks, either as man or bear. Instead, you discern the large, telltale footprints of Trolls. Fearing the worst, you follow the tracks to an impromptu camp set up under a rocky overhang. Grimbeorn lies in chains at the feet of some Trolls who cackle about the great feast they plan to make of him! You need hear no more—drawing your weapons, you rush to his rescue.

Freed from the chains, Grimbeorn claps you on the shoulder in thanks. You start toward the river, but he surprises you by heading deeper into the woods. "More Trolls lurk nearby," he growls. "We shall teach them the folly of crossing Grimbeorn the Old!" You dash after the Skin-changer, his shouts as easy to follow as his trail through the brush. Bursting into a moonlit clearing, you see Grimbeorn facing three massive Trolls. “A barrel of beer to any who bring me a Troll’s head!” he proclaims, lunging at the nearest foe. You will need to defeat the Trolls outright or find a way to keep them occupied until the sun rises!

The Rangers of the North patrol the wilds of Eriador, guarding against evil with ceaseless vigilance. First among their number is Aragorn, son of Arathorn. Troubled by evidence of dark powers spreading across the land, he ventures toward Rivendell, there to seek Elrond's counsel. On a forested road at the foot of the Misty Mountains, he senses an unquiet presence…

Text: Although weary from your trevails, you summon the strength to cross the enchanted river. Having its dark waters between you and your pursuers brings some measure of relief, but you know well that further dangers lie ahead. You continue your journey, even more determined to warn the Beornings of the unrest stirring within Mirkwood Forest…

An unearthly shriek reverberates through the predawn woods as Ungoliant's Spawn thrashes about in her death throes. Even as her swollen carcass twitches its last, you spare no time to revel in victory. Eager to leave this place behind, you strike out deeper into the forest to continue your mission…

Against all odds, you have escaped Mirkwood Forest. Before you stretches the vales of Anduin, and the Misty Mountains beyond. The next leg of your journey lies to the south: the realm of the Beornings. Having seen firsthand the menace rising within Mirkwood, you know well the urgency to your mission. Still, you grant yourself a brief pause to gather your strength, the clear sky being a welcome change from your time under Mirkwood's dark canopy…

The battle is hard fought, but at last you stand triumphant. Even so, it is but a momentary victory. The strength of the Orcs' assault leaves little doubt that this was not a random attack: they intend to leave no witnesses to their presence in the region. Sparing a last look at the evidence of your defiance, you clamber back aboard the raft to complete your journey to the Beornings…

"Fine work," Grimbeorn says, looking upon the defeated Trolls. "I am in your debt." You explain that encountering him was not mere happenstance. The Beorning chieftain grows somber as you share the news of unrest along Mirkwood's borders, then gives a decisive nod. "Come; I would hear more of the King of Dale's offer. And there is that beer I promised!" You smile despite your weariness. Uniting the Beornings and Men of Dale against the forces marshaling within Mirkwood addresses but one threat of many. Yet, wherever your next adventure may lead, you take heart that the Free Peoples shall rise to the challenge…
You have halted the spiders' advance; yet more adventure awaits…

Text_FR: You have halted the spiders' advance; yet more adventure awaits…

Text: A card type representing friends, followers, creatures, and hirelings that you can play to assist your Heroes on their Quest.
Text_CN: 这是玩家在前往下个场景前所必须完成的主要目标。

Text: The icon shown in your profile.
Text_CN: 中土世界的种族之一，并非特指『男人』。
Text_FR: La première campagne du jeu Le Seigneur des Anneaux : Jeu de cartes évolutif.

Text: A series of 5 Quests that tell a larger story.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此项关键词的人物在发动攻击时会得到等同于此项数值的加成。
Text_FR: Une série de 5 quêtes racontant une histoire complète.

Text: The first time you log into the game every 24 hours, the game generates a challenge tied to a random unlocked Quest. You receive Valor (and potential additional rewards) for completing each daily challenge.
Text_CN: 这是真知晶石提供的奖励，或者也可在游玩困难难度时获取。你可以使用5个信号火炬来解锁一个你选定的英雄包。
Text_FR: Il s'agit d'une carte que vous pouvez utiliser pour obtenir un effet immédiat en jeu. Il n'est possible de disposer que d'une seule carte de faveur dans votre deck au début d'une quête.

Text: Achievements that are tracked over the lifetime of your account.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的人物会在敌人发动攻击前抢先发起反击。如果此举能够击败敌人，那么敌人就无法发动攻击了，否则敌人将正常结算攻击流程。
Text_FR: Il s'agit des cartes Allié, Attachement et Événement que vous pouvez utiliser lors d'une quête. Chaque carte de joueur se rattache à l'une des quatre sphères d'influence (Commandement, Connaissance, Énergie ou Tactique) ou bien est neutre.

Text: This card type refers to all Heroes and Allies. Enemies are also considered Characters.
Text_CN: This card type refers to all Heroes and Allies. Enemies are also considered Characters.
Text_FR: This card type refers to all Heroes and Allies. Enemies are also considered Characters.

Text: Displayed in the upper-left corner, this is the number of Resources needed to play a card. Hero cards do not have a cost, since they begin the game in play.
Text_CN: 由3到5个场景所构成的特制冒险故事。
Text_FR: Cette sphère d'influence souligne le charisme et le magnétisme d'un héros. Elle représente son potentiel à diriger, stimuler et commander des alliés et d'autres héros.

Text: The cards you use in the Quest. Rollover to see how many remain.
Text_CN: The cards you use in the Quest. Rollover to see how many remain.
Text_FR: The cards you use in the Quest. Rollover to see how many remain.

Text: A defeated Character is discarded. This can occur by falling to 0 Health or through some other means.
Text_CN: A defeated Character is discarded. This can occur by falling to 0 Health or through some other means.
Text_FR: A defeated Character is discarded. This can occur by falling to 0 Health or through some other means.

Text: The challenge level you face in a Quest: Easy, Normal, or Hard. Sauron's Resources increase as the difficulty goes up, but you can gain greater rewards if you survive!
Text_CN: 你会在这个阶段内与索隆进行回合制的较量，并可攻击敌人或者挑战目标。
Text_FR: Toutes les cartes des joueurs et de Sauron ont un coût qui est indiqué dans le coin en haut à gauche. Il s'agit de la quantité de ressources à dépenser pour pouvoir jouer chaque carte. Les héros n'ont pas de coût, puisqu'ils commencent la partie en jeu.

Text: One of the Dúnedain, the Men of the West.
Text_CN: One of the Dúnedain, the Men of the West.
Text_FR: One of the Dúnedain, the Men of the West.

Text: The act of committing a Character to an Objective.
Text_CN: 关键词。当游戏中存在敌人时，玩家无法挑战拥有此关键词的目标。
Text_FR: Combinaison de cartes alliés, attachements ou événements que vous piochez lors d'une quête. Chaque deck est composé de 30 cartes et ne peut disposer que d'un maximum de 2 copies de chaque carte. Un deck de joueur est basé sur 3 héros de votre choix, et déterminez les sphères parmi lesquelles choisir les cartes de votre deck.

Text: A card type that covers any scheme, twist of fate, or other effect that occurs during the game.
Text_CN: 游玩困难难度时获得的勇猛点数加成。
Text_FR: Une aventure spécifique composée de 3 à 5 lieux.

Text: A card is exhausted when it is used. All exhausted cards ready during Upkeep.
Text_CN: A card is exhausted when it is used. All exhausted cards ready during Upkeep.
Text_FR: A card is exhausted when it is used. All exhausted cards ready during Upkeep.

Text: An expendable card that you can use for an immediate in-game effect.
Text_CN: 显示在你的概况界面上的图标。
Text_FR: La première fois qu'un joueur se connecte chaque 24 heures, le jeu génère un défi aléatoire lié à une quête déverrouillée aléatoire. Le joueur reçoit une récompense en Vaillance (et d'autres récompenses potentielles) une fois le défi quotidien terminé.

Text: This card is removed at the end of the round.
Text_CN: This card is removed at the end of the round.
Text_FR: This card is removed at the end of the round.

Text: Select to adjust game settings or to leave the Quest.
Text_CN: Select to adjust game settings or to leave the Quest.
Text_FR: Select to adjust game settings or to leave the Quest.

Text: A person from the most prominent kingdom of Men in Middle-earth.
Text_CN: A person from the most prominent kingdom of Men in Middle-earth.
Text_FR: A person from the most prominent kingdom of Men in Middle-earth.

Text: This target must be defeated before you can attack another target.
Text_CN: This target must be defeated before you can attack another target.
Text_FR: This target must be defeated before you can attack another target.

Text: Damage amount that can be suffered before being defeated.
Text_CN: Damage amount that can be suffered before being defeated.
Text_FR: Damage amount that can be suffered before being defeated.

Text: A main Character that you control during a Quest. Heroes start the game in play, and have a Threat value instead of a cost. If all your Heroes are defeated, you fail the Quest.
Text_FR: Ce mot-clé se réfère à une capacité qui ne peut être ni évitée, ni annulée.

Text: One of a race of gentle beings with a reputation for preferring a settled life over excitement and adventure.
Text_CN: One of a race of gentle beings with a reputation for preferring a settled life over excitement and adventure.
Text_FR: One of a race of gentle beings with a reputation for preferring a settled life over excitement and adventure.

Text: An individual such as Gandalf or Saruman who is more than mortal and possessed of great age and power.
Text_CN: An individual such as Gandalf or Saruman who is more than mortal and possessed of great age and power.
Text_FR: An individual such as Gandalf or Saruman who is more than mortal and possessed of great age and power.

Text: A Sphere of Influence representing the potential to lead, inspire, and command others.
Text_CN: 对于成为行动对象的人物或任务的一般性描述。
Text_FR: Le plus grand royaume des Hommes de la Terre du Milieu.

Text: A distinct Quest stage. Completing a Quest requires advancing through a series of Locations.
Text_CN: 游戏中存在四种属性类别：领导型、博学型、精神型与战术型。每种类别均注重于一种特定属性的强度。每个英雄都会从属于一个类别，这也决定了你在牌组中可以使用的卡牌种类。
Text_FR: Un héros est le personnage principal que vous contrôlez lors d'une quête. Les héros peuvent participer à des objectifs ou à des combats contre les ennemis, et peuvent disposer de pouvoirs supplémentaires que vous pourrez utiliser. Les héros forment la base de chaque deck que vous créez : les héros choisis déterminent la sphère d'influence dont vous devrez choisir les cartes pour composer votre deck. Les héros commencent la partie en jeu, et disposent d'un niveau de menace à la place du coût. Si tous vos héros sont vaincus, la quête est échouée.

Text: A Sphere of Influence emphasizing intellect, wisdom, and specialized knowledge.
Text_CN: 在这个阶段中，玩家与索隆会依次从各自的牌组中布置盟友、装备与事件卡牌。
Text_FR: Une race bienveillante avec la réputation de préférer une vie bien tranquille à l'excitation de l'aventure.

Text: A person from the second clan of the Elves.
Text_CN: A person from the second clan of the Elves.
Text_FR: A person from the second clan of the Elves.

Text: A task that you may face in the course of a Quest.
Text_CN: 人物在挑战目标时的效率。
Text_FR: Un personnage avec ce mot-clé n'est pas épuisé la première fois qu'il est attaqué.

Text: The primary goal you must resolve before you can advance to the next Location.
Text_CN: The primary goal you must resolve before you can advance to the next Location.
Text_FR: The primary goal you must resolve before you can advance to the next Location.

Text: A member of an evil and violent race who serve Sauron.
Text_CN: A member of an evil and violent race who serve Sauron.
Text_FR: A member of an evil and violent race who serve Sauron.

Text: You can use the Palantír to gain rewards such as Valor Points, new cards, and cosmetic items.
Text_CN: You can use the Palantír to gain rewards such as Valor Points, new cards, and cosmetic items.
Text_FR: You can use the Palantír to gain rewards such as Valor Points, new cards, and cosmetic items.

Text: During this phase, you and Sauron take turns playing cards prior to adventuring.
Text_CN: 这种属性类别注重于军事技艺，特别是那些在冒险中所需处理的战斗与战术挑战。
Text_FR: Uniquement trouvé sur les cartes de héros, ce chiffre est ajouté au compteur de niveau de Menace au début de toute quête dans laquelle vous utilisez ce héros.

Text: These are any Ally, Attachment, and Event cards you use throughout a Quest.
Text_CN: These are any Ally, Attachment, and Event cards you use throughout a Quest.
Text_FR: These are any Ally, Attachment, and Event cards you use throughout a Quest.

Text: A deck of 30 cards based on 3 Heroes of your choice. You build each deck based on these Heroes, and you cannot have more than 2 copies of any individual card.
Text_CN: 将人物派去挑战目标的游戏操作。
Text_FR: Il représente une tâche à laquelle vous devrez faire face au cours d'une quête. Les objectifs peuvent ralentir ou compliquer votre route vers la victoire, et devront souvent être atteints avant de pouvoir progresser vers le lieu suivant. Remplir des objectifs requiert de la Volonté et/ou de vaincre un ennemi.

Text: An ability that you may choose to activate.
Text_CN: An ability that you may choose to activate.
Text_FR: An ability that you may choose to activate.

Text: An Event card type whose effect triggers based on a timing window or circumstance.
Text_CN: An Event card type whose effect triggers based on a timing window or circumstance.
Text_FR: An Event card type whose effect triggers based on a timing window or circumstance.

Text: The amount by which you reduce an Objective's Quest value each time you apply Willpower.
Text_CN: 每隔24小时，当玩家首次登录游戏后，游戏都会提供一项与已解锁的随机冒险相关的任务。完成每日任务后，玩家便会得到一项勇猛奖励（以及可能会存在的额外奖励）。
Text_FR: L'action pour un personnage de prendre part à un objectif.

Text: Follows your Heroes from one Location to the next.
Text_CN: Follows your Heroes from one Location to the next.
Text_FR: Follows your Heroes from one Location to the next.

Text: The value of an Objective. You use Willpower to resolve an Objective.
Text_CN: The value of an Objective. You use Willpower to resolve an Objective.
Text_FR: The value of an Objective. You use Willpower to resolve an Objective.

Text: The attacker does not take damage when attacking an exhausted target.
Text_CN: The attacker does not take damage when attacking an exhausted target.
Text_FR: The attacker does not take damage when attacking an exhausted target.

Text: All player cards have a listed rarity: Starter and Hero, as well as Common, Uncommon, Rare, and Legendary. The less common a card is, the more potent its abilities.
Text_CN: All player cards have a listed rarity: Starter and Hero, as well as Common, Uncommon, Rare, and Legendary. The less common a card is, the more potent its abilities.
Text_FR: All player cards have a listed rarity: Starter and Hero, as well as Common, Uncommon, Rare, and Legendary. The less common a card is, the more potent its abilities.

Text: The act of completing, overcoming, or otherwise removing an Objective.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的卡牌技能会在人物进入游戏时即刻触发。
Text_FR: Capacité de carte pouvant être activée lors de votre tour. En fonction de sa description, un pouvoir peut être activé une ou plusieurs fois par tour.

Text: Used to play cards. Resources refresh during Upkeep.
Text_CN: Used to play cards. Resources refresh during Upkeep.
Text_FR: Used to play cards. Resources refresh during Upkeep.

Text: This ability triggers when the card is defeated.
Text_CN: This ability triggers when the card is defeated.
Text_FR: This ability triggers when the card is defeated.

Text: A person from the kingdom between the Misty Mountains and White Mountains.
Text_CN: A person from the kingdom between the Misty Mountains and White Mountains.
Text_FR: A person from the kingdom between the Misty Mountains and White Mountains.

Text: An Elf who is more interested in knowledge than in combat, compared to their Noldor cousins.
Text_CN: An Elf who is more interested in knowledge than in combat, compared to their Noldor cousins.
Text_FR: An Elf who is more interested in knowledge than in combat, compared to their Noldor cousins.

Text: An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.
Text_CN: An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.
Text_FR: An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.

Text: Each of the four Spheres of Influence (Leadership, Lore, Spirit, Tactics) focuses on a particular personality aspect. Every Hero belongs to a Sphere, which dictates the cards you can include in a deck.
Text_FR: Ce mot-clé fait référence à un effet qui a lieu à un moment particulier.

Text: A Sphere of Influence encompassing strength of will and aspects of the supernatural.
Text_CN: 英雄是你在冒险中所控制的主要人物。英雄可以攻击敌人或者挑战目标，并拥有一些可用使用的特技。英雄也是你创建的每个牌组的基础，他决定了你可用来选择组成牌组的卡牌的类别。在游戏开始时，英雄便会配置完毕。他们的成本值会被威胁值所取代。如果你的英雄全部战败，那么冒险也就会宣告失败了。
Text_FR: Le fait de venir à bout d'un objectif.

Text: This card does not exhaust the first time it is attacked.
Text_CN: This card does not exhaust the first time it is attacked.
Text_FR: This card does not exhaust the first time it is attacked.

Text: Cannot be attacked unless all non-Stealth targets are exhausted.
Text_CN: Cannot be attacked unless all non-Stealth targets are exhausted.
Text_FR: Cannot be attacked unless all non-Stealth targets are exhausted.

Text: Does not exhaust after the first action each round.
Text_CN: Does not exhaust after the first action each round.
Text_FR: Does not exhaust after the first action each round.

Text: A Sphere of Influence emphasizing martial prowess, from tactical challenges to direct combat.
Text_CN: A Sphere of Influence emphasizing martial prowess, from tactical challenges to direct combat.
Text_FR: A Sphere of Influence emphasizing martial prowess, from tactical challenges to direct combat.

Text: This increases each round and when you travel. If you reach 50 Threat, your Quest fails.
Text_CN: This increases each round and when you travel. If you reach 50 Threat, your Quest fails.
Text_FR: This increases each round and when you travel. If you reach 50 Threat, your Quest fails.

Text: This tracks the level of risk you take during a Quest. Your Threat increases at the end of each round and when you travel. If you reach 50 Threat, you fail the Quest.
Text_CN: This tracks the level of risk you take during a Quest. Your Threat increases at the end of each round and when you travel. If you reach 50 Threat, you fail the Quest.
Text_FR: This tracks the level of risk you take during a Quest. Your Threat increases at the end of each round and when you travel. If you reach 50 Threat, you fail the Quest.

Text: This number applies from each Hero to the Threat meter at the start of the Quest.
Text_CN: This number applies from each Hero to the Threat meter at the start of the Quest.
Text_FR: This number applies from each Hero to the Threat meter at the start of the Quest.

Text: Some cards have traits which indicate certain behavior or restrictions.
Text_CN: 关键词。拥有此关键词的人物不会在执行首次行动后便进入行动完毕状态。
Text_FR: Cette sphère d'influence souligne la prouesse martiale d'un héros, particulièrement à tout ce qui se rattache à l'art du combat et à la résolution des défis tactiques que les joueurs vont devoir affronter durant une quête.

Text: At the start of each round, your cards ready, you gain Resources, and you draw 1 card from your deck; Sauron then does the same. Certain abilities may also activate at this time.
Text_FR: Le territoire sur lequel de nombreuses aventures du Seigneur des anneaux se déroulent.

Text: In-game rewards that you can spend to get Quests, Heroes, cards, avatars, and more.
Text_CN: In-game rewards that you can spend to get Quests, Heroes, cards, avatars, and more.
Text_FR: In-game rewards that you can spend to get Quests, Heroes, cards, avatars, and more.

Text: This ability triggers upon defeating a target.
Text_CN: This ability triggers upon defeating a target.
Text_FR: This ability triggers upon defeating a target.

Text: An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.
Text_CN: An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.
Text_FR: An Attachment type. A Character can have only one Attachment of each type at a time.
